text: Glutamicibacter halophytocola is a Gram-positive, aerobic non-motile bacterium from the genus of Glutamicibacter which has been isolated from the roots of the plant Limonium sinense from Lianyungang in China. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Glutamicibacter halophytocola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2017 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Glutamicibacter halophytocola
